casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jontele SWANSON-DEVILL GOODWIN, Defendant-Appellant. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jontele Swanson-Devill Goodwin, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158130, SC: 158132
COA: 337329, COA: 338266 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 13, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the second motions of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing an amended application for leave to appeal are GRANTED. The amended application submitted on March 11, 2019, is accepted for filing.
